title: Grilled Panzanella Salad with Peaches and Fennel
ingredients: 1 large fennel bulb, halved, cored and thinly shaved on a mandoline
instructions: 1. Cut a large piece of Reynolds Wrap® Non Stick Aluminum Foil and firmly fit it over the grill grate. Heat the grill to medium heat. 2. In a shallow bowl, combine the shallot, vinegar, maple syrup, and salt and pepper; let sit until the shallots are tender, about 10 minutes. Add 4 tablespoons of the oil and whisk until blended. Set aside. 3. Rub bread with the cut side of garlic and brush with 1 tablespoon of oil. 4. Grill the bread until toasted, about 7 to 10 minutes. Remove and let cool. 5. Brush peaches with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Grill until lightly browned, about 4 to 5 minutes. 6. In a large bowl, toss arugula and basil; tear bread into chunks and add along with peaches and fennel. Mix in dressing and toss.
